title: Shawnee, Oklahoma
summary: Shawnee is a city in Pottawatomie County, Oklahoma, United States. The population was 29,857 in 2010, a 4.9 percent increase from the figure of 28,692 in 2000.[5] The city is part of the Oklahoma City-Shawnee Combined Statistical Area; it is also the county seat of Pottawatomie County[6] and the principal city of the Shawnee Micropolitan Statistical Area.
